text: Tai koise, “Hoi.” Jitia Peter ghor te ghusi loise, Jisu taike poila kotha korise, eneka koi kene, “Tumi ki bhabe, Simon? Kun logot pora prithibi laga raja khan poisa uthai? Taikhan laga bacha khan pora na dusra khan pora?17.25 Utu somoikhante rajakhan jiti kene loi ana manu khan ke kar loi thakise.”
